short: Meta-tier that constrains all rewrite systems in IGSOA / MBC-4.0.
long: tier\_XX\_RS defines abstract invariants that every rewrite system in
the MBC-4.0 / IGSOA stack must satisfy: Termination, Confluence,
and Non-Expansion of semantic dimension. This tier is responsible
for guaranteeing that each Box, operator pack, and interaction
table admits unique, invariant-safe normal forms.
